english.segment1: The reason why I stand. The answer lies in you. You hung to make me strong. Though my praise was few. When I fall and bring your name down
english.segment2: But I have found in you. A heart that pleads forgiveness. Replacing all these thoughts. Of painful memories. But I know. That your response will always be
english.segment3: (Chorus). I'll take you back always. And even when your fight is over now. Even when your fight is over now. I'll take you back always. And even when the pain is coming through. Even when the pain is coming through. I'll take you back
english.segment4: You satisfy this cry. Of what I'm looking for. And I take all I can. And lay it down. Before the throne of endless grace, now. That radiates what's true
english.segment5: I'm in the only place. That erases all these faults. That have overtaken me. But I know. That your response will always be
english.segment7: I can only speak. With a grateful heart. As I'm pierced by this gift. Of your love
english.segment8: I will always bring an offering. I can never thank you enough
english.segment9: You'll take me back always. And even when my fight is over now. Even when my fight is over now. You'll take me back always. And even when my pain is coming through. Even when my pain is coming through. You'll take me back always
english.segment10: Even when my fight is over now. Even when my fight is over now
english.segment12: Even when my pain is coming through. Even when my pain is coming through
